title: CCFOLIA Export
description: When you fill in each item of your character, this tool formats it into a format that can be output to CCFOLIA. Conversely, it can also read from the CCFOLIA output format, which is useful when you want to change a few values here and there!
load_from_clipboard_failure_description: Data does not exist in the clipboard or is in an incorrect format.

form.name: Name
form.initiative_tips: This value indicates the character's ability to act. It affects the order in which characters are displayed.
form.externalUrl_tips: The URL of the character reference, usually the URL of the charadter sheet.
form.status_description: From left to right, enter the label, value, and maximum value, in that order.
form.status_tips: Set the statuses that fluctuate in conjunction with the character, such as HP and MP. You can refer to the current value from the chat by saying {label}.
form.params_tips: Set parameters for the character that seldom vary. You can refer to the value from chat by saying something like {label}.
form.color_tips: The color of the chat when you select a character.
form.commands_placeholder: You can refer to the value of a status parameter by doing something like {attack power}.
form.commands_tips: This command can be entered quickly from the chat when a character is selected.

chat.name: Character 1
chat.content: This is a test message. The color is reflected in the character's name.
